org.libav

Interface IDecoder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFrameProducer, IPacketConsumer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioFrameDecoder, VideoFrameDecoder

    public interface IDecoder
extends IFrameProducer, IPacketConsumer
    Decoder interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close this decoder and release all its resources.
      void flush()
      Flush the decoder.
      ICodecContextWrapper getCodecContext()
      Get decoding codec context.
      IStreamWrapper getStream()
      Get underlaying stream.
      boolean isClosed()
      Check whether the decoder has been closed.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.libav.data.IFrameProducer

        addFrameConsumer, removeFrameConsumer

      • Methods inherited from interface org.libav.data.IPacketConsumer

        processPacket

    • Method Detail

      • getCodecContext

        ICodecContextWrapper getCodecContext()
        Get decoding codec context.
        Returns:
        decoding codec context

      • getStream

        IStreamWrapper getStream()
        Get underlaying stream.
        Returns:
        underlaying stream

      • close

        void close()
        Close this decoder and release all its resources.

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Check whether the decoder has been closed.
        Returns:
        true if the decoder has been closed, false otherwise

      • flush

        void flush()
           throws LibavException
        Flush the decoder. (Call this at the end of decoding process.)
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs
